info.name: Zinger framework
info.description:
# Overview
Zinger is an open source framework for building hyperlocal delivery
mobile and web applications.

It provides developers easy to handle backend for ordering & delivering foods, groceries, fruits, vegetables, medicines, etc.

For more info, visit: https://zinger.tech

# Zinger Architecture
![alt text](https://github.com/ddlogesh/zinger-framework-docs/blob/master/website/static/img/zinger/zinger-arch.png?raw=true "Zinger Architecture")

item.name: User API

request.description:
* For an existing user, returns the user and place details.
* For a new user, creates the user details record and returns a response code-**1163**.
* Response code-**1151** is generated if an existing user is blocked by the administrator.

response.name: SIGN UP

request.description: Updates the client profile details including the place/campus preference.
Updates the partner profile details.

* Updates the notification token generated in the front-end.
* For each user, up to 5 notification tokens are maintained and it can be extended as per the requirement.
* Push Notification token is generated using **Firebase Cloud Messaging**.

* For a successful login, return the user and list of shop details he/she belongs to.
* Response code-**1155** is generated if the user record is not found.

response.name: LOGIN  SUCCESS

item.description: User API allows you to authenticate clients and partners. It also allows for updating the user's profile and notification token.

item.name: Shop API

request.description:
**URL** : /shop/place/{placeId}

Returns the list of shops in a given campus/place.

response.name: SUCCESS

request.description:
**URL** : /shop/{shopId}

Returns the shop details for a given shop id.

* Insert a new shop in a given campus/place. 
* It is restricted to the user with **ADMIN** access.

* Update the shop details which includes shop name, contact details, opening & closing time, delivery availability, etc.
* It is restricted to zinger partner.

* Delete a shop for a given shop id. 
* It is restricted to the users with **ADMIN** access.

item.description:
Shop API allows you to fetch and update shop details.

**NOTE**:

* merchantId - ID provided by the payment gateway.

item.name: Place API

request.description: Returns the list of campuses/places.

response.name: SUCCESS

request.description:
* Insert a new place/campus. 
* It is restricted to the user with **ADMIN** access.

item.description: Place API allows you to fetch and update the place/campus.

item.name: Order API

request.description:
* Verifies the order details and returns the unique order id and transaction token from the payment gateway.
* This token is used to initiate the transaction in the front-end.
* For a failed response, any one of the response code is returned.

  * **1263** - Delivery Option not available.

  * **1266** - Restaurant not accepting orders.

  * **1296** - Some Items are not available.

  * **1300** - Order price mismatch.

request.description:
**URL** : /order/{searchQuery}/{pageNumber}/{pageCount}

* Returns the list of orders matching the given search query, for the given shop id in a paginated manner.
* It is restricted to the zinger partner.
* Search query may be client name, mobile number, or order id.

request.description: Updates the order rating for the given order id.

# Order Status Lifecycle
![alt text](https://github.com/ddlogesh/zinger-framework-docs/blob/master/website/static/img/zinger/order-status-lifecycle.png?raw=true "Order Status Lifecycle")

* Updates the order status for the given order id.
* For a failed response, any one of the response code is returned.
  * **1281** - Invalid secret key.
  * **1282** - Invalid Order status.

**NOTE** : 

* Secret key, which is obtained from the client, is given as input only when completing the order.

item.description:
* Order API allows you to place, track, and fulfill the order.
* It also allows you to fetch and search the past orders.

item.name: Notification API

request.description:
* Sends the given website URL to the client and partner via push notification.
* It is restricted to the **ADMIN** access.

* Notifies the client about the new shops or items via push notification.
* It is restricted to the **ADMIN** access.

item.description: Notification API allows you to notify the client and partner through push notification, email and SMS.
